meanings.definition: a type of palm tree native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The piassabas swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Many colorful birds nested in the branches of the piassabas.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys played hide-and-seek among the piassabas.
meanings.sent4: The piassabas stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The dense foliage of the piassabas provided shade from the scorching sun.

meanings.definition: the fibers from the piassaba palm used for making brushes and brooms.
meanings.sent1: She carefully wove the piassabas into a sturdy broom.
meanings.sent2: The villagers collected piassabas to craft useful tools.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tangled itself in the piassabas, pretending to be a brush.
meanings.sent4: The piassabas fibers swept away the dust with ease.
meanings.sent5: The rough texture of the piassabas made them perfect for scrubbing.
